original_text: These are the amounts of the materials used for the tabernacle, the tabernacle of the covenant law, which were recorded at Moses’ command by the Levites under the direction of Ithamar son of Aaron, the priest.
korean_text: 성막 곧 증거막을 위하여 레위 사람이 쓴 재료의 물목은 제사장 아론의 아들 이다말이 모세의 명령대로 계산하였으며

sentences.original_text: These are the amounts of the materials used for the tabernacle
the tabernacle of the covenant law
which were recorded at Moses' command
by the Levites under the direction of Ithamar
sentences.korean_translation: 르위 사람들에 의해 이다말의 지시 아래에서
